Title: Enacts the "AIM higher act"
Summary: Provides state aid to certain municipalities to offset tax exempt land, and certain housing and infrastructure costs for the state fiscal year beginning April 1 next succeeding the effective date, and each fiscal year thereafter; directs the director of the budget to create a formula for the amounts of such aid, and to select municipalities to receive such aid.
LawCode: Add ยง54-n, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to enacting the "AIM higher act"
